sourcesContent:
import React,{useRef, useState} from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef('') const [tourRating, setTourRating]= useState(null) // call API va load Data tu database const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id === id) // destructue properties from tour object const {photo,title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) // gui request den sever const submitHandler = e=> { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value } return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0? ( "Not Rated" ) :( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} {price}đ {distance} km {maxGroupSize} nguười
Mô tả

{desc}

{/* tour reivews section */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}> 1 setTourRating(2)}> 2 setTourRating(3)}> 3 setTourRating(4)}> 4 setTourRating(5)}> 5
{ reviews?.map(review => (
Nguyễn Thành Công

{ new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-US") }

5
Một trải nghiệm tour tuyệt vời!!
)) }
{/* tour reivews section end*/}
} export default TourDetails
